shows.title: Repair Cafe
shows.desc:
Renew your clothes. Mend them, change them, love them.
Patching, darning, seams, buttons, zips, jumpers, jeans, shirts, skirts, bags - learn skills or share skills, bring your own stuff or do one of our mini-projects.
Penn, Jane and Carey will be on hand to guide you through your sewing experience.
Note: Under 14s will need an adult companion.
